hero.title: Tunisian Municipality API
hero.description: Access comprehensive Tunisian municipality data with powerful filtering options. Built for developers, by developers.

powerfulFiltering.title: Powerful Filtering
powerfulFiltering.description: Filter by governorate, delegation, postal code, and more

richData.title: Rich Data
richData.description: Complete municipality data with coordinates and Arabic names

map.title: Interactive Map
map.ZoomInstructionDescription: Zoom in closer (level 10+) to see delegation markers in specific areas

playground.title: API Playground
playground.description: Test the API with real data.
playground.apiResponsePlaceholder: // Your API response will appear here
playground.geolocationError: Failed to get your location. Please allow location access or check your internet connection.
playground.geolocationNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by this browser.

parameters.title: üîç Query Parameters
parameters.description: Use these parameters to filter the municipality data. All parameters are optional and can be combined.

name.description: Filter by governorate name (e.g., Ariana, Tunis, Sfax)

delegation.description: Filter by delegation name within a governorate

location.description: Get municipalities near a specific location within a radius (in km)
